title: Canva AI â€” AI Tool Review
description: Canva AI integrates multiple AI tools (image generation, text, translation, background removal) directly into the world's most popular design platform. Canva has integrated AI deeply across its platform, including AI image generation, Magic Write for text, Magic Design for instant templates, Background Remover, AI photo editing, and Magic Animate for presentations. As the world's most popular design tool with 150M+ users, Canva's AI features reach the broadest possible creative audience. Highlights: Integrated into existing Canva workflow. Easy to use for non-designers. Massive template library. Multiple AI tools in one platform. Free tier available.
